meanings.definition: Sail or travel all the way around (something, especially the world).
meanings.sent1: The brave explorer circumnavigated the globe in a small boat.
meanings.sent2: The ship circumnavigated the entire planet in record time.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous sailor decided to circumnavigate the world on a paddleboard.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to circumnavigate the globe was as strong as the ocean currents.
meanings.sent5: The journey to circumnavigate the world was filled with excitement and challenges.

meanings.definition: Successfully complete a journey around (something, especially the world).
meanings.sent1: After many months at sea, the sailor finally circumnavigated the earth.
meanings.sent2: The team successfully circumnavigated the globe without any major setbacks.
meanings.sent3: The cat attempted to circumnavigate the backyard but got distracted by a butterfly.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to circumnavigate the world was as strong as the ocean currents.
meanings.sent5: The journey to circumnavigate the world was filled with excitement and challenges.
